definition: poker in which each player receives hole cards and the remainder are dealt face up, provide with or construct with studs
details:
noun
- poker in which each player receives hole cards and the remainder are dealt face up
- adult male horse kept for breeding
= synonyms: studhorse
- an upright in house framing
= synonyms: scantling
- ornament consisting of a circular rounded protuberance (as on a vault or shield or belt)
= synonyms: rivet
- a man who is virile and sexually active
= synonyms: he-man, macho-man
verb
- provide with or construct with studs
= example: provide with or construct with studs
- scatter or intersperse like dots or studs
= synonyms: dot, constellate
